Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 4, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ SWAROVSKI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09RV1CF7G

Minimalist and unique: The Solitaire Pendant necklace features a dainty eye-catching white crystal pendant paired with a delicate rhodium plated chain for a truly timeless accessory
Designed to last: Swarovski jewelry will maintain its brilliance over time when simple care practices are observed; remove before contact with water, lotions or perfumes to extend your jewelry’s life
Versatile and eye-catching: Whether an everyday accent or a unique, conversation-starting accessory, this Solitaire pendant necklace is a simple piece that will complement any look on any occasion
Items delivered: 1 x Swarovski Solitaire Pendant for women, 15 inch rhodium plated metal chain, with 3/8 x 5/8 inches white center stone, complete with Swarovski necklace box

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

From the brand

We understand pets are like family and have worked hard to developed products for both you and them to enjoy. Our collections have wide variety of designs and sizes in order to suit your pets needs and fit into any home style. We’ve curated thoughtful products that are both functional for your pet and timeless in design. You will be able find everything you need to help your furry friend feel right at home.

Shop Storage Bins

Shop Ceramic Food Bowls

Shop Food Mats

More to love from Bone Dry!

Polyester Polyamide Microfiber
PERFECT TOWEL TO DRY SMALL, MEDIUM, AND LARGE DOGS AND CATS: Bone Dry Pet Towel measures 41×23.5″ and is great for drying dogs and cats of different breeds and sizes
MATERIAL AND CARE: Towel is made of ultrasoft microfiber, machine washable, and super absorbent, making drying your pet easy; For best long lasting results, do not use fabric softener
LIGHTWEIGHT DURABLE AND EASY TO CARRY: This towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home; Provides comfort for your pet and protection for your couch, carpet, car, bed, floor, or chair
KEEP YOU PET WARM AND COZY: Great for grooming, traveling, a pet kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable
MORE BONE DRY PET PRODUCTS: Bone Dry is a highly trusted brand for pet accessories; Click Bone Dry above to view more of our products


Pet Towels

DII Bone Dry microfiber dog bath towels with embroidered paw print or bone are durable, absorbent, and fast drying. These microfiber dog bath towels are long lasting and machine washable. Quickly dry off your pet after bath time with DII super absorbent pet towels.

Lightweight and easy to care for, this towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home.

Great for grooming, traveling, in a kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable.

Visit Our Brand Page

To view more of DII’s pet products visit our official site for our entire selection.

  • Wicker Pet Baskets – Three Sizes!
  • Pet Storage Bin-Three Sizes in Various designs
  • Non-Skid Pet Food Bowl- Three Sizes with Various designs
  • Pet Bath Towels
  • Pet Blankets
  • Pet Bed-Machine Washable!
  • Cage Liner and Under Cage Mat

Read more

DII Bone Dry Pet Products





Wicker Pet Basket

DII wicker pet toys and accessories storage or home décor bone shape basket comes in three sizes: 18 inch long by 7.5 inch tall, 21 inch long by 78 inch tall, and 24 inch long by 9 inch tall These wonderful baskets easily clean with a damp wet cloth or sponge. DII wicker baskets are dark espresso in color with a modern look making this a great décor piece for your home. The lid securely latches to keep your pet from opening, so no more sneaking treats! The convenient handle makes it easy to transport or move when needed. DII wicker pet baskets are perfect for holding dog treats, leashes, toys, blankets and more!

Pet Bed

DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is perfect for your dog or cat. Elevated sides block drafts and also give your pets a place to rest their head on. Available in various sizes to fit a variety of breeds. Made of durable Oxford fabric and filled with premium polyester fiber for added support. Our Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is machine washable and cushion is removable making cleaning super easy. Give your pet the perfect place to cuddle while adding stylish décor to your home with DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed.

Ultra-Absorbent Microfiber Pet Mat

Bone Dry Microfiber Pet Mat provides your pet with their own dining area to minimize mess. It absorbs spills and keeps their eating area nice and dry. This pet placemat is made of super absorbent microfiber and immediately absorbs any slop, splash or spill. A great piece for your pet’s kennel or cage – maximum absorbency ensures that your pet is not lying in spilled water while you are away. Protect your carpets and hardwoods from water spills or food stains with DII’s absorbent pet mat.

Cuddly Pet Blankets

DII Bone Dry absorbent microfiber pet blankets come in an assortment of colors and excellent for travel or nap time for your adorable pet. DII offers wonderfully made absorbent microfiber pet blankets that features a cute and adorable bone shape design and are heavenly soft to touch. These pet blankets are perfect for your pet to lie on while in a car, crate, and kennel to keep your pet warm, cozy, and dry.

Read more





Microfiber Plush Mop Mitt Towel

The best towel for drying your pet. Each side is sew together allowing for pockets for your hands. These pockets give you the ability to quickly run the towel up and down your pet and dry quickly. Microfiber Chenille will quickly grab dirt and water off of your pet, 10 times more absorbent than cotton. Because of this, your towel is picking up more moisture on your pet. Your pets will dry faster, making bath time a lot easier.

Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl

DII Bone Dry Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl is perfect for your dog or cat – suitable for food and water and available in various designs and sizes. The bowl is conveniently dishwasher safe so it can be easily cleaned. The silicone rim at the bottom will keep your pet’s bowl from sliding around on the floor, which means no more messy floors for you to clean. Delight your hungry pup with this ceramic bowl in a fun print with a stay-put silicone bottom.

Pet Storage Bin

DII pet toys and accessories rectangle storage basket comes in three sizes. The neutral colors and subtle texture of these baskets makes them great décor pieces for your home. The storage basket stands upright and the convenient handles make it easy to transport or move when needed. DII pet toys and accessories round storage baskets are perfect for holding dry dog treats, leashes, collars, toys, blankets, outfits, grooming supplies, and more!

Bone Dry Pet Toy

Bone Dry loves pets! Our Pet Toy collections are great way to bond with your furry pal. Buy one or a pair today to make tails wag and dog owners smile. Our squeaky dog toys provide comfort and satisfies your dog’s natural urge to chew. With so many characters to choose from in different toy styles our DII Bone Dry toys are great for hours of fun. Perfect for your pooch to entertain themselves or a bonding experience with you and your pet.

Price: $15.10
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:20 UTC – Details)


Add to your family game collection today with this perfect 6 game assortment from Pressman. This convenient all-in-one set features iconic favorites including Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Tic-Tac-Toe, Snakes & Ladders, and Pahrcheesi. Enjoy high-quality plastic components, including interlocking Checker pieces, full-sized Staunton Chess pieces, and much more for endless classic fun. For 2 or more players, ages 8 and up.
CHESS: A board game of strategic skill for two players, played on a checkered board. Each player begins the game with sixteen pieces that are moved and used to capture opposing pieces according to precise rules. The object is to put the opponent’s king under a direct attack from which escape is impossible. Also known as Checkmate.
CHECKERS: Checkers is a strategy board game for two players which involves diagonal moves of uniform game pieces and mandatory captures by jumping over opponent pieces.
BACKGAMMON: Backgammon is one of the oldest known board games. Its history can be traced back nearly 5,000 years to archaeological discoveries in Mesopotamia, modern-day Iraq. It is a two-player game where each player has fifteen pieces that move between twenty-four triangles according to the roll of two dice.
SNAKES & LADDERS: Snakes and ladders, known originally as Moksha Patam, is an ancient Indian board game for two or more players regarded today as a worldwide classic. It is played on a game board with numbered, gridded squares. A number of “ladders” and “snakes” are pictured on the board, each connecting two specific board squares.
TIC TAC TOE: A game in which two players seek, in alternate turns, to complete a row, a column, or a diagonal with either three O’s or three X’s placed in the spaces of a grid of nine squares.
PAHRCHEESI: Pahrcheesi is a race game for four players. The goal is for each player to move their pieces from the starting position (the circles in the corners) to the home square (in the center of the board), passing a nearly complete loop around the board in the counter-clockwise direction before going up towards the main row.

Classic 6 Game Collection by Pressman, Ages 8 and Up, 2 Players

Add to your family game collection today with this perfect 6 game assortment from Pressman. This convenient all-in-one set features iconic favorites including Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Tic-Tac-Toe, Snakes & Ladders, and Pahrcheesi. Enjoy high-quality plastic components, including interlocking Checker pieces, full-sized Staunton Chess pieces, and much more for endless classic fun. For 2 or more players, ages 8 and up.

Enjoy classics like Pahrcheesi, Chess and Backgammon

Includes favorites like Snakes and Ladders, Checkers and Tic Tac Toe

This Classic 6 Game Collection is the perfect addition to your set of family games!







Classic 6 Game Collection
Bean Bag Toss
Michigan Rummy
Mexican Train Dominoes
Dominoes: Double Six Color Dot Dominoes in Tin
Description Add to your family game collection today with this perfect 6 game assortment from Pressman. This convenient all-in-one set features iconic favorites including Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Tic-Tac-Toe, Snakes & Ladders, and Pahrcheesi. This timeless game is perfect for indoor or outdoor fun! A staple for your next tailgate or barbecue, this set has everything you need to start playing. Features a sturdy plastic game base, 6 bean bags, scoring labels, and complete instructions. Game night is about to take a twist with Michigan Rummy by Pressman. This game blends the classic gameplay of rummy and poker to form an entirely new experience. Includes 96 colorful playing chips, a 14-inch playing board, and complete instructions. Introduce your family to a new way to play the old classic game of dominoes! Play all the dominoes from your hand onto one or more chains, or “trains,” leading from a central hub. Can’t play? Use the colorful trains to mark the end of your turn. This classic Double Six Color Dot Dominoes from Pressman is perfect for the avid domino player. The high-quality dominoes are finished with dots in rich, bold colors and fit snugly in this vintage style tin box for easy, stylish storage.
Minimum Age 8+ 6+ 8+ 6+ 5+
Minimum Players 2 2 3 1 2
Maximum Players n/a 2 8 8 4

item.title: Antiquity Quest | A Set Collection Game from The Creators of Cover Your Assets & Skull King, Grandpa Beck’s Games | 2-8 Players 10+
item.dc:creator: admin

Manufacturer Grandpa Beck’s Games

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:17 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Shop Grandpa Beck’s Games!

Shop Grandpa Beck’s Games!

Shop Grandpa Beck’s Games!

NEW SPIN ON A CLASSIC GAME: Antiquity Quest is a re-imagined take on the classic card game Hand and Foot, but with more gameplay, strategy and enticing artwork. In this fantasy game, players are aspiring archaeologists who travel the world in order to discover artifacts from ancient civilizations to add to their collections. At the end of the game, whichever player has the most flawless collection of priceless antiquities and treasures earns the most prestige and wins!
FUN FOR ALL AGES: It doesn’t matter whether you are 10 years old or 100 years old; Grandpa Beck’s Games are designed to be enjoyed by all ages! Antiquity Quest is a fast-paced card game that inspires playful competition, and helps create lasting bonds and memories. The foremost objective, however, is to have fun! Regardless of the occasion – date night or game night with family and friends – this game is guaranteed to be a winner. It’s ideal for 2-6 individual players or 2-4 pairs of players.
EASY TO LEARN & PLAY: The goal of Antiquity Quest is to assemble the most prestigious collection of priceless antiquities and treasures, while competitors aim to foil your efforts by adding incompatible items to it. The more challenging a collection is to build, the more it is worth. The refreshingly simple rules are explained clearly and concisely in the rule book, so you can get the fun started right away!
IT’S ABOUT MORE THAN LUCK: Luck is only a minor part of the winning equation in Antiquity Quest. As one of Grandpa Beck’s most skill-based games, Antiquity Quest involves meticulous planning, brilliant strategy and logic. The nuanced facets of the game will enthrall players with creative and tactical minds. Unlike many board games – which require little to no reasoning and operate on the roll of the dice – this game will require you to think outside the box to come out on top.
GRANDPA BECK KNOWS BEST: When it comes to family fun, no one understands better than Grandpa! Brent and Tauni – aka Grandma and Grandpa Beck – created this card game in the same way they’ve created all their games: by sitting around the kitchen table with their 5 kids and their spouses, and their 17 grandkids. They’ve enjoyed a lifetime of fun and games with their family and loved ones, and are on a mission with every game they dream up to pass the good times on to you!

Read more

Read more

5
Price: $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:17 UTC – Details)

  • Link adoration in the Swarovski® Infinity Heart Necklace. Pave heart pendant is highlighted by a rose-gold infinity pendant and link chain.
  • Lobster claw closure provides an adjustable length.
  • Imported.
  • Measurements:
    • Chain Circumference: 14 1⁄2 in
    • Adjuster Length: 2 in
    • Pendant Height: 7⁄12 in
    • Pendant Width: 1 0⁄1 in
    • Weight: 0.1 oz

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 15, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09XBFJ56W

Minimalist and unique: The Infinity Heart necklace features a dainty heart entwined with a delicate infinity sign and paired with a touch of sparkling clear crystal pavé on a delicate chain
Designed to last: Swarovski jewelry will maintain its brilliance over time when simple care practices are observed; remove before contact with water, lotions or perfumes to extend your jewelry’s life
Versatile and eye-catching: Whether an everyday accent or a unique, conversation-starting accessory this Infinity pendant necklace is a simple piece that will complement any look on any occasion
Items delivered: 1 x Swarovski infinity heart pendant for women, 14 7/8 inch mixed metal plated chain, with sparkling clear crystals, complete with Swarovski necklace box

  • You deserve nothing but the best wearing the Swarovski® Subtle Drops Bracelet featuring a rhodium-plated bracelet sparkling with a brilliance that nothing can compare to.
  • Additional dangling rhodium plated clear crystals.
  • Adjustable sliding closure to help fit any wrist size.

Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ SWAROVSKI

Vividly sparkling: The entirety of the delicate rhodium plated chain is adorned with circular clear crystals and finished with adjustable bolo closure
Designed to last: Swarovski jewelry will maintain its brilliance over time when simple care practices are observed; remove before contact with water, lotions or perfumes to extend your jewelry’s life
A thoughtful gift: With its timeless design and polished look, this bracelet goes with any collection, whether for you or a gift for celebrating friendship, birthdays and other memorable moments
